name: GrowthRabbit
description:
Growth Marketing Infrastructure & Strategy Services
1. Funnels and Workflows
2. Paid Acquisition Strategy (Paid Social and Paid Search Ads)
3. Email Automation
4. Data Analysis & Reporting

Channel Blending & Scaling Services
1. Paid Ads Management & Optimisation
2. Conversion Rate Optimisation
3. Email Marketing

team.name: Chintan Maisuria
team.bioHtml:
Founder and CEO of RevTap - Shopify Business Intelligence

GrowthRabbit - Help startups build marketing infrastructure which helps them grow and scale.

team.name: Abhishek Sutradhar
team.bioHtml: Focused Business Development Manager with exceptional planning & implementation capabilities from technology & sales background with over 3 years of experience.

team.name: Chinmaya Shankar
team.bioHtml: Co-founder @RevTap - Shopify Business Intelligence Helping companies grow via @GrowthX HQ

jobs.title: Account Manager (Paid Social)
jobs.description:
* Creating, developing & implementing effective Facebook Ads Network strategies.
* Understanding funnels and digital marketing strategies for all client campaigns.
* Executing & optimizing many Facebook Ads campaigns simultaneously.
* Manage and scale Facebook ad campaigns that meet or exceed designated campaign KPIs for our customers. 
* Overseeing campaigns across a number of paid social platforms (e.g. Facebook and Instagram).
* Audience research and build targeting audience personas.
* Tracking daily, weekly & monthly KPI's to identifying opportunities for improvement.
* Collect, analyse and generate key insights from campaigns, collate in deck/PPT and share with clients.
* Update clients via weekly emails, calls, and reports on current status of account, successes and strategy moving forward. Respond to all communications in a timely manner.
* Organize hypotheses and recommendations, and be comfortable sharing with internal Project members and clients.
* Confidently provide client support with very little oversight from management.
* Develop and maintain a complete knowledge of (ever-changing) Facebook tools for building campaigns, audiences, conversion tracking, and other tools used in delivering results for customers.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
• Creating, developing & implementing effective Facebook Ads Network strategies.
  • Understanding funnels and digital marketing strategies for all client campaigns.
  • Executing & optimizing many Facebook Ads campaigns simultaneously.
  • Manage and scale Facebook ad campaigns that meet or exceed designated campaign KPIs for our customers.
  • Overseeing campaigns across a number of paid social platforms (e.g. Facebook and Instagram).
  • Audience research and build targeting audience personas.
  • Tracking daily, weekly & monthly KPI's to identifying opportunities for improvement.
  • Collect, analyse and generate key insights from campaigns, collate in deck/PPT and share with clients.
  • Update clients via weekly emails, calls, and reports on current status of account, successes and strategy moving forward. Respond to all communications in a timely manner.
  • Organize hypotheses and recommendations, and be comfortable sharing with internal Project members and clients.
  • Confidently provide client support with very little oversight from management.
  • Develop and maintain a complete knowledge of (ever-changing) Facebook tools for building campaigns, audiences, conversion tracking, and other tools used in delivering results for customers.
